
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VSine1kHzTone.cpp
          VSine1kHzTone.h
          VSine1kHzTone__Syms.cpp
          VSine1kHzTone__Syms.h
          VSine1kHzTone__Trace.cpp
          VSine1kHzTone__Trace__Slow.cpp
  DEPENDS Sine1kHzTone.v sine1khz.mem
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Sine1kHzTone.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VSine1kHzTone STATIC
    VSine1kHzTone.cpp
    VSine1kHzTone__Syms.cpp
    VSine1kHzTone__Trace.cpp
    VSine1kHzTone__Trace__Slow.cpp
    Sine1kHzTone.v
    sine1khz.mem
)

target_compile_options(VSine1kHzTone PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VSine1kHzTone PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VSine1kHzTone verilated)
